column7: RCA Type 77 Mic Spiral Red (Yukio Miyamoto)
column8: RCA type 77 uni directional Microphone t-shirt by Yukio Miyamoto. RCA type 77 uni directional Microphone t-shirt by Yukio Miyamoto. This microphone had two ribbons a pressure ribbon and a velocity ribbon, the 77 C enabled a choice of pickup from one or the other or both.  The switch can be seen at the bottom of the mic.    The precision of Yukio's simulation matches the manufacturing quality of the microphone.  Show your appreciation of sound and precision, wear our RCA type 77 Microphone t shirt by Yukio Miyamoto.
